doc.field: Susan Karp Manning collection of political photographs and ephemera
Susan Karp Manning collection of political photographs and ephemera

Five photographs, one poster, one phonograph album, and six autographs of U.S. presidents (Truman, Nixon, Ford, Carter, Obama), politicians, and actors, assembled by Susan Karp Manning. For further details about this collection, and to request it for research, please read its catalog record, or write to printroom@nyhistory.org.
